meanings.definition: The quality or state of being exterior.
meanings.sent1: The exteriorities of the house were well-maintained.
meanings.sent2: She admired the exteriorities of the beautiful garden.
meanings.sent3: The exteriorities of the cake were so perfect that it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor was just an exteriority hiding his nervousness.
meanings.sent5: The exteriorities of the mountain range were breathtaking in the morning light.
